item.title: Need help with ::ipban (nameofplayer)
item.dc:creator: @L30tegna L30tegna
item.description:
@L30tegna wrote:

maybe add this

[code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 3 ||

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“UR NAME”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
v.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(“player successfully ip banned”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": HAS IP BANNED THE PLAYER: "+command.substring(5);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
 }
  }

}
then add this with the other public voids

[code]public void appendToBannedIps (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error ip banning user!");
 }
  }

}

[/code][/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2008, 12:01:21 PM[/size][hr]lol delet the things;p

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ::ipban (nameofplayer)
item.dc:creator: @mod_lol1 mod_lol1
item.description:
@mod_lol1 wrote:

I ipban a guy but he can still login on other account!!!

[code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights >= 1) {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
PlayerHandler.kickNick = otherPName;
sendMessage(p.connectedFrom+" is now banned.");
BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“data/bannedips.txt”, true));
bw.write(p.connectedFrom);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error banning ip.”);
}
}
}
}[/code]
ok this is my commands of ipban but is it wrong or sumthing why can they login on a other account when I ipbaned them???
please help

owner of k0scape
co-owner of ownedyouscape

Read full topic
